name: Slidey Penguin (Seelum)
description:
Slidey Penguin!

Slide around on the icy plane to avoid snow falling on you. But be careful. If you stay on the same side of the map for more than 2 seconds, large hail will fall right on your head at a fast speed. 

I created all assets, including the art and music, myself. 

Please comment below with your high score! my high score was 166 :)
